nodes.documentation:
@notice To get the user data
 @return Returns the EIN, address owner, array of card ids, array of bank ids and array of investment ids
nodes.name: getUserData

params._bankNumber: The number of the bank to add

params._cardNumber: The number of the credit or debit card to add to your account
params._cvv: The 3 or 4 digit code for verifying the card
params._expiry: When the card expires in timestamp

addCard(uint256,uint256,string,uint256).return: bytes32 Returns the encrypted card bytes32

params._investmentNumber: The number of the investment account that you want to create
params._name: The name of the investment account

addInvestmentAccount(uint256,string).return: bytes32 Returns the encrypted investment account hash

params._bankNumber: The number of the bank used in the encryption process
params._name: The name of the bank used in the encryption process

checkBank(bytes32,string,uint256).return: Returns true if the parameters are valid or false if the bank has not been added to this EIN user

params._encryptedCard: The encrypted bytes of the card with all the parameters

checkCard(bytes32,string,uint256,uint256.return: Returns true if the parameters are valid, otherwise returns false

params._name: The name of the encrypted investment account used in the encryption process

checkInvestment(bytes32,uint256,string).return: bool Returns true if the parameters are valid and have been the used in the encryption process or false if they are not

params._identityRegistry: The address of the Identity Registry contract

getUserData().return: Returns the EIN, address owner, array of card ids, array of bank ids and array of investment ids

addCard(uint256,uint256,string,uint256).notice: To add a new credit card to your account. All function will be encrypted the moment the data is added

addInvestmentAccount(uint256,string).notice: To create an investment account for your user

checkBank(bytes32,string,uint256).notice: To verify if a bank details are valid and get those values from the parameters

checkCard(bytes32,string,uint256,uint256.notice: To verify if the card is valid and get the parameters

checkInvestment(bytes32,uint256,string).notice: To verify the investment details and get those values from the parameters

methods.constructor: To setup the address of the identity registry to use for this contract

userdoc.notice: The Hydrogen Finance contract for managing financial accounts such as credit cards, banks and invement accounts on-chain using encryption technology
